headline: ConocoPhillips (COP) Nearing Deal to Divest Oklahoma Assets to Stone Ridge Energy
summary: ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) is one of the top stocks sold by hedge funds. On July 11, RBC Capital trimmed the price target on COP from $115 to $113, while reaffirming an Outperform rating on the shares. According to RBC, expected earnings and cash flow per share are slightly higher than the company’s own assumptions of $1.30 […]

headline: ConocoPhillips: The Knife Is Done Falling (Ratings Upgrade)
summary: ConocoPhillips is a buy with strong FCF growth, Marathon Oil synergies, and major project upside, despite oil price risks. See why COP stock is upgraded to buy.

headline: SCHD Vs. VIG: Which One Is Better?
summary: SCHD offers higher income and diversification but faces growth limits, while VIG favors total return and dividend growth. Learn why SCHD ETF is a buy.
